fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Izvajanje evropske kohezijske politike s poudarkom na urbanem razvoju, ki bo ustrezno nastavljen lokalnim potrebam.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
goals__remit: Zastopanje interesov mestnih občin Slovenije, izvajanje mehanizma celostnih teritorialnih naložb.
position: predsednica Odbora za evropske zadeve in mednarodno sodelovanje ZMOS
